                                java.lang.String size,
                                java.lang.String color,
                                java.lang.String ratio)
        Gets Bitmap according to operator, API and other parameters
        Parameters:
        operatorName - the name of the operator as returned by the discovery API
        apiName - the name of the API to display the logo for
        size - required logo size
        color - required logo color scheme
        ratio - required logo aspect ratio
        Returns:
        Bitmap
